hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin shu'aib, from his father, from his grandfather, that:the Messenger of Allah prohibited lending on the condition of a sale, or to have two conditions in one transaction, or to profit from what you do not posses

chapter.ara-name: باب سَلَفٍ وَبَيْعٍ وَهُوَ أَنْ يَبِيعَ السِّلْعَةَ عَلَى أَنْ يُسْلِفَهُ سَلَفًا
chapter.eng-name: Lending on condition of Buying or Selling
